basics.name: PHAN Vỹ Hào
basics.label: Data Scientist
basics.summary: I have more than 2 years of experience in data science, machine learning, and AI. My major is LLM models development and application in recruitment and office automation domain. I have also developed some projects in Computer Vision for tracking and counting people.

work.name: Mylong Inc.
work.summary: Developing an intelligent HR assistant for their tasks related to recruitment and employee management process.

work.name: FPT Software
work.summary: Developing and maintaining intelligent RAG LLM models. Developing a japanese license plate recognition and tracking system.

work.name: Kyanon Digital
work.summary: Developing a demo version of a pipeline for recognizing people, reID, pose detection, and tracking.

education.institution: University of Information Technology, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

publications.name: Intelligent Scene Text Recognition in Streaming Videos
publications.summary: This research explores scene text recognition for extracting text from images and videos, which is increasingly important for visual media on social networks. We evaluated modern deep learning architectures like SAST, EAST, and Rosetta on the Vietnamese Vintext dataset by VinAI, comparing their real-time performance in frames per second.

publications.name: A Novel License Plate Image Reconstruction System using Generative Adversarial Network
publications.summary: This paper proposes a two-stage deep learning based algorithm for license plate reconstruction in parking lot management systems. The first stage uses YOLOv4 transfer learning to detect license plate positions, while the second stage employs Pix2Pix GAN to reconstruct poor quality, unrecognizable license plate images into perceptible ones. The system aims to enhance license plate image quality for both human and computer recognition.

projects.name: Talent AI Assistant
projects.summary: Led the development of an advanced AI-powered chatbot assistant for an enterprise HR platform. Key achievements include: (1) Implementation of automated daily reporting system for recruiter workforce management, (2) Development of an HR knowledge base with 92% accuracy in query responses, (3) Creation of an intelligent onboarding system with contextual navigation assistance, (4) Design and deployment of an AI-driven job matching algorithm for optimal candidate placement.

projects.name: Shieve Data Platform
projects.summary: Led the development of core form recognition and data extraction capabilities for processing scanned technical drawings as Lead Data Engineer. Architected and implemented the solution utilizing Azure Cloud Services and Document Intelligence to enable automated document processing and analysis.

projects.name: Advanced Generative AI Innovation
projects.summary: Served dual roles as Business Analyst and AI Engineer across multiple client sub-projects focused on developing generative AI solutions. Key deliverables included fine-tuned LLM models capable of zero-shot question answering, an AI-powered physiognomy analysis assistant, and an automated system for staff ticket generation, etc.

projects.name: ChatGPT-based Banking Assistant
projects.summary: Developed and implemented an AI-powered banking assistant leveraging natural language processing to provide accurate responses based on internal documentation. Achieved 80% response accuracy while delivering the solution within an accelerated one-month development timeline.

projects.name: Japanese Intelligent Tracking System
projects.summary: Responsible for the AI Engine which recognizes and tracks Japanese license plates, achieving 92% accuracy in real-time tracking at a Japanese parking station using a limited training dataset of ~300 images from the client.
